notes:
A weaker version of [[Quara Constrictor]]s. This monster can be seen during raids on [[Liberty Bay]].
{{JSpoiler|You may hunt 400 Quara Constrictor Scouts, [[Quara Hydromancer Scout]]s, [[Quara Mantassin Scout]]s, [[Quara Pincher Scout]]s and [[Quara Predator Scout]]s combined as a task of the [[Killing in the Name of... Quest]].}}
abilities: {{Ability List|{{Melee|0-130+}}|{{Ability|[[Berserk|Life Drain Berserk]]|0-80+|element=life drain|scene={{Scene|spell=3x3spell|effect=Trembling Effect|caster=Quara Constrictor Scout|casting_effect=Trembling Effect}}}} }}
name: Quara Constrictor Scout
bestiarytext: The Quara Constrictor Scout is a weaker version of [[Quara Constrictor]]s.
behaviour: They run when in deep dark red health.
location: [[Malada]], [[Arena Quarter]], [[Treasure Island]] Eastern Caves, [[Hrodmir Quara Scout Caves]], [[Quara Grotto]], [[Oramond]].
strategy:
'''[[Paladin]]s''': They are easy to kill from distance.
'''[[Mage]]s''': Use [[energy strike]].
'''[[Knight]]s''': Their defence is very low and they deal quite low damage.
